title: Forging his chains.
author: Bidwell, George.
snippet: I got 'round to the street by another way, and was there as soon as he. I ran him to Duncan Street, Stockbridge, in which he came to a standstill and could not run any farther. He made several thrusts at me with a stick which he had in his hand.

title: Forging his chains.
author: Bidwell, George.
snippet: his exit into the area in Scotland Street. lie then ran up the stairs, scaled the railings, and made off down the street, along Royal Crescent, and up Duncan Street. M'Kelvie still kept well up, the constable having fallen considerably in the rear.
